mapper.select: SELECT pw.*, ps.is_checked, ps.submit_word FROM puzzle_word AS pw LEFT JOIN puzzle_status AS ps ON pw.word_id = ps.word_id AND ps.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} WHERE pw.crossword_id = ( SELECT pt.crossword_id FROM puzzle_team AS pt WHERE pt.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} );
select pw.word, pw.clue, pw.no, pw.orientation from puzzle_word as pw where pw.crossword_id = ( select pt.crossword_id from puzzle_team as pt where pt.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} ) ORDER BY pw.no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proposal_word (word_id, puzzle_team_id, word) VALUES (#{wordId}, #{puzzleTeamId}, #{word});
mapper.select: SELECT hl.letter FROM hidden_letter AS hl JOIN letter_collection AS lc ON lc.hidden_letter_id = hl.hidden_letter_id WHERE lc.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM proposal_word_necessary_char WHERE proposal_word_id = #{proposalWordId} and necessary_char = #{word}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proposal_word_submit_char (proposal_word_id, team_member_id, submit_char) VALUES (#{proposalWordId}, #{memberId}, #{word});
